channel.title: 2006Legends
channel.description:
[center]Im/We are currently trying to find developers, no we arent yet 24/7 but fairly soon! SUGGEST ENYTHING ON FORUMS!! Atleast please register, even if you wont play :) i would appreciate that!
[size=14pt]XP RATE IS: 20.0![/size]
For 2006 remake we are using currently 2006Memorys, As fast as i can release it to public it will be there!
This isnt 2006Scape, this is 2006Scape Advanced - 2006Memorys from Rune-Server released by Lee
I have now thinked to make this project like a year, now its time to dreams come true!
[url=http://www.2006legends.tk]2006Legends[/url]
AS i havent myself yet made alot of chances yet, project is gonna start really really slow, and before you join our team you must have some kind of knownlenguage of java and proof of it.
Pictures so far: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/3ubnn.png[/img]
Team [QUOTE]Currently only me: Zambu: Head of Project Redone[/QUOTE]
Updates[QUOTE] Update: Working on donation system and also looking for developers! [/QUOTE]
We are going to be adding unique content, as soon as i have team
Credits 2006Scape Developers Lee Toby Zak BASH Mod Tom

item.title: 2006Legends
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

i don’t know if you’re aware, but there are currently 2007 servers being ran by jagex, (not to mention, RR) so i highly doubt that this will go anywhere. however, you may be able to gather yourself a small community if you know what you’re doing.

then again, i haven’t played any rpsp’s in awhile now. with that being said, i could be completely clueless and have no idea what i’m talking about.

Read full topic
